properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT RR.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT RB.* FROM (SELECT TB_REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, COUNT, MEMBER_ID, REVIEW_PHOTO_ADDRESS || '/' || REVIEW_PHOTO_CHANGENAME "TITLE_IMG", TB_REVIEW_BOARD.MEMBER_NO, TB_REVIEW_BOARD.STATUS, FILELEVEL FROM TB_REVIEW_BOARD LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW_PHOTO ON (TB_REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NO = TB_REVIEW_PHOTO.REVIEW_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_REVIEW_BOARD.MEMBER_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) WHERE FILELEVEL = 1 OR FILELEVEL IS NULL ORDER BY TB_REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NO DESC)RB)RR WHERE STATUS = 'Y')RRR WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_REVIEW_BOARD WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW_BOARD ( REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, STATUS, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, ? )

INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW_PHOTO ( REVIEW_PHOTO_NO, REVIEW_PHOTO_ORIGINNAME, REVIEW_PHOTO_CHANGENAME, REVIEW_PHOTO_ADDRESS, REVIEW_NO, STATUS, FILELEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_PHOTO_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_REVIEW_NO.CURRVAL, DEFAULT, ? )
UPDATE TB_REVIEW_BOARD SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_ID, COUNT FROM TB_REVIEW_BOARD JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_REVIEW_BOARD.MEMBER_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
SELECT REVIEW_PHOTO_NO, REVIEW_PHOTO_ORIGINNAME, REVIEW_PHOTO_CHANGENAME, REVIEW_PHOTO_ADDRESS, REVIEW_NO FROM TB_REVIEW_PHOTO WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FILELEVEL ASC
UPDATE TB_REVIEW_BOARD SET STATUS = 'N', COUNT = 0 WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_REVIEW_PHOTO SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE REVIEW_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_REVIEW_COMMENT ( COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, REVIEW_NO, MEMBER_NO, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEW_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, ?, SYSDATE, ?, ?, DEFAULT )

SELECT RL.*, ROWNUM FROM (SELECT COMMENT_NO, COMMENT_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, REVIEW_NO, MEMBER_ID FROM TB_REVIEW_COMMENT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_REVIEW_COMMENT.MEMBER_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) WHERE REVIEW_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COMMENT_NO ASC)RL

SELECT RR.* FROM (SELECT RB.* FROM (SELECT TB_REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, COUNT, MEMBER_ID, REVIEW_PHOTO_ADDRESS || '/' || REVIEW_PHOTO_CHANGENAME "TITLE_IMG", TB_REVIEW_BOARD.MEMBER_NO, TB_REVIEW_BOARD.STATUS, FILELEVEL FROM TB_REVIEW_BOARD LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW_PHOTO ON (TB_REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NO = TB_REVIEW_PHOTO.REVIEW_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (TB_REVIEW_BOARD.MEMBER_NO = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_NO) WHERE FILELEVEL = 1 OR FILELEVEL IS NULL ORDER BY TB_REVIEW_BOARD.REVIEW_NO DESC)RB)RR WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY COUNT DESC
